job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes analyzing requirements and presenting results to both technical (dev) and business teams, indicating an understanding of business needs and alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en onderhoudt ook data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Directly states responsibility for building and maintaining data pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: Specifies the purpose of data pipelines, which involves data processing and management for monitoring.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Confirms involvement in building data stacks and pipelines.
Indicates direct involvement in experimenting with and implicitly building or adapting models.

job_tasks.phrase: 20% van de tijd werken aan features en modellen
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions working on models as part of the job responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: werkt mee aan onze web applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Indicates participation in building web applications.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: While related to data, building a 'data stack' implies software development to support data infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This involves building and integrating services, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
job_tasks.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies implies working within a software development team structure.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions 'devops', 'infra-as-code', and 'CICD', which are core components of MLOps/Operations Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the responsibility of building out an ML Ops platform.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and accountability for models and jobs in production aligns with operational responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters
you build it, you run it mentaliteit
je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes end-to-end implementation of ML models, including data pipelines, modeling, and operational aspects like MLOps (CICD, infra-as-code). While there's mention of web applications, the core focus is on the ML lifecycle and infrastructure, aligning more with the ML Engineer profile.
